Appearance

RainlogsHigh-performance log management

Self-hosted, zero-config, EU-sovereign log storage and analysis.

Get Started
View on GitHub

Zero-Config Onboarding

Spin up the entire stack (API, Worker, PostgreSQL, Redis, Garage S3) with a single `docker compose up -d`.

EU-Sovereign Storage

Built-in integration with Garage S3 for distributed, sovereign object storage.

Secure by Design

AES-256-GCM encryption at rest via KMS for sensitive data like Cloudflare API keys.

GDPR Compliant

Automated log expiry workers enforce retention policies (e.g., 395 days for NIS2).

High Performance

Written in Go 1.24, utilizing Asynq for robust background job processing.

Real-time Monitoring

Includes Asynqmon for real-time queue monitoring and task management.
